content: The Flint Vanguard is protected by a significant amount of Searing Fire and Scorching Fire enemies. These enemies make it extremely easy to get overwhelmed in this fight. A Pluck of Many can help you clear out some of the minions so you can focus on the Flint Vanguard itself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Vanguard is protected by a significant amount of Searing Fire and Scorching Fire enemies. These enemies make it extremely easy to get overwhelmed in this fight. A Pluck of Many can help you clear out some of the minions so you can focus on the Flint Vanguard itself.
